segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures everyday life gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area is a disaster with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, no drain working, overflowing onto everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just polishes her plate, ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be soaked soon enough.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, open cabinets show the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbing stool that's all crooked and unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snatching cookies like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl standing by, palm up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're making a sneaky mess of their own.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's garden view is the only clean thing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel gross just looking at this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR
